Your time is limited, so donâ€™t waste it living someone elseâ€™s life.

Hi, I am @huxpro (Huang, Xuan), a will-be Facebook software engineer and a professed UI/motion designer. My interests range from programming languages, compiler construction, web/app development, human computer interaction and developer infra. In the past, I worked on Alitrip (Fliggy) mobile/web at Alibaba Group, found and lead front-end infrastructure team at unicorn startup Beijing Weiying (WePiao), and helped Ele.me upgrading their mobile site into the first influential progressive web app in China.

I studied BA, Digital Media Art at Communication University of China and MS, Computer Science at Rochester Institute of Technology.

My Programming Languages Spectrum

Left-right is how much I prefer it. Top-down is how much I know it. Versions are lower bounds.
